item.robotics.extend_o_boots.tooltip.sum: Your _equipable Scaffolding_! Allows you to create an _extendable temporary scaffolding_ under you.
item.robotics.extend_o_boots.tooltip.act: Allows you to _activate_ the ExtendOBoots through _scrolling up or down_
item.robotics.program.tooltip.summary: A _program containing code_! Allows you to _program robots_.
item.robotics.program.tooltip.action2: Allows you to _apply_ the program's _code_ to the _robot_
block.robotics.code_editor.tooltip.summa: A block that allows you to _edit_ a program's _contents_!
robotics.ponder.programming.text_1: To change the contents of a Program you need a code editor.
robotics.ponder.programming.text_2: Right click the code editor with the program to get started!
robotics.ponder.programming.text_3: When you're finished coding right click with the program on a programmable robot to apply your code to it.
